EmailTemplate.description: Template for informing respective team for access impact
EmailTemplate.name: RMA: Access Impact
EmailTemplate.subject: {!RMA__c.Access_Impact__c}: {!RMA__c.Fab__c} {!RMA__c.Name} for {!RMA__c.Customer_Name__c} is {!RMA__c.Workflow_Stage__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!RMA__c.Fab__c} {!RMA__c.Name} for {!RMA__c.Customer_Name__c} is {!RMA__c.Workflow_Stage__c}.
As per the originator, this RMA has impact to {!RMA__c.Access_Impact__c}.
This is for your information & necessary action.
Please take necessary action before re-submitting.
Click here to access the RMA request.
Thank You. _______________________________________________________ For further clarification /queries please contact the originator of the RMA, if there are any issues:
RMA Originator: {!RMA__c.Originator_Name__c} Contact: {!RMA__c.Originator_Contact__c} Email ID: {!RMA__c.Originator_Email__c}
Note: This is a system generated auto email notification. Please do not reply.
